p: Varicella zoster (VZV) is the causative agent of chickenpox/shingles and is a DNA virus and member of Î±-herpesvirus family [ 47, 48]. VZV is a component of several vaccines including the combined measles, mumps, rubella, and varicella (MMRV) vaccine [ 47], and newer vaccines such as live-attenuated herpes zoster vaccine for adults >50 years [ 49]. Vero cells were superior to HEp-2 cells as Vero cells could propagate VZV, thus they were chosen for analysis. KD of CNTD2 and EP300 resulted in a 10-30-fold increase in VZV replication.
